table.name: vtiger_listtouroperators
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listtouroperators` ( `listtouroperatorsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `turoperator_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listtouroperatorsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_listtouroperatorscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_listtouroperatorscf` ( `listtouroperatorsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`listtouroperatorsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
